Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game Class for creating a game with id, players, numPlayers and SharedBoard.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerUsername) throws TooManyPlayersException
      Method used to add a Player in Game
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - is the player username as a String
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException - while trying to add a player when the Game is full

    • randomizePlayers

      public void randomizePlayers()
      Method used to randomize the order of the players.
      Used to randomize the turn order of the players in the game.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Method used to reset the SharedBoard.
      It creates a new board with new shuffled decks.

    • manageObjectives

      public void manageObjectives()
      Method used to manage the objectives of the game.
      It shuffles the deck and draws the objectives to be placed in the SharedBoard.

    • updateAvailableColors

      public void updateAvailableColors(Color playerColor)
      Method used to manage the available colors of the game.
      It removes the color of the player from the available colors.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - the color of the player
